title: 88/531/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 October 1988 approving the updated version of the outline plan of agricultural work in Italy pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 270/79, as subsequently amended (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 October 1988
approving the updated version of the outline plan of agricultural work in Italy pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 270/79, as subsequently amended
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(88/531/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The updated version of the outline plan of agricultural advisory work in Italy forwarded by the Italian Government on 20 January 1988 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 270/79, as subsequently amended, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 October 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
